name: Vanilla Roasted Peaches
preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 400° F (205° C).
  2. Combine sugar, water, and cinnamon sticks in Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup. Bring to a boil over medium heat and simmer until sugar dissolves.
  3. Remove from heat and add vanilla extract.
  4. Arrange peaches, cut-side up, on Sheet Pan lined with parchment paper. Pour syrup over peaches and bake for 25 minutes, basting frequently using Basting Brush.
  5. Place 2 peach halves on each dessert plate and drizzle with remaining syrup.

ON THE GRILL

  1. Preheat barbecue to medium. 
  2. Place peaches, cut-side down, on grill. Barbecue for 1-2 minutes, until marks form. 
  3. Turn over and baste with syrup. Continue grilling for 1-2 minutes, until tender. 
  4. Place in bowls and spoon additional syrup overtop. Yum.
tips:
Try 1 tsp Apple Pie Spice or Cinnamon (Ground) instead of cinnamon sticks.

Garnish each serving with a Cinnamon Stick. 

Delicious over low-fat frozen vanilla yogurt. 

For breakfast, serve sliced over whole-grain toast, waffles or pancakes.
